name: Cuber (s4m_gamer_D34D)
description:
yeah just a simple "avoid to hit the objects" game

Install EXE
  1. Run the installer (the steps are also in the installer)
  2. Select the folder you want the game to be in
  3. Select the start menu folder
  4. If you want a desktop shortcut (recommended) click the checkbox
  5. Click next then Install 
  6. and play
ZIP
  • Simple
  1. Open the ZIP and run Cubethon.exe and play
  • Not so simple
  1. put the ZIP in the place you want to install it in
  2. extract everything
  3. run Cubethon.exe and play
